text:
Members of various associations and political parties observed a fast here on Sunday to urge the Centre to establish a facility similar to the All India Institute of Medical Sciences at Sengipatti in this district.

Those who spoke in the meet included MDMK state deputy general secretary Durai Balakrishnan, CPI district secretary R. Thirugnanam, Vanigar Sangankalin Peravai district president M. Ganesan, Sanoorapatti panchayat president Kannagi Nandakumar, Sengipatti Panchayat president R. Sathiyamoorthy, AITUC district president V. Sevaiah and AITUC TNSTC Kumbakonam Division Coordinator Durai Mathivanan.
title: Fast observed
